name: averlist
description: This site need for watching a anime and management your anime list.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run start"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run start:dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint" "cd server && npm run lint"
scripts.install:project: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install"
